refnamediv.refpurpose: Provide a control for epics channels with discrete enumerable values.

refsect1.title: SUMMARY
refsect1.para: The epicsEnumeratedControl command provides a widget that allows you to monitor and control epics channels that can take one of a list of possible settings values. The widget is based on a radioMatrix widget, but the variable is bound to an epics channel.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: All of the options associated with a radioMatrix widget are accepted by the epicsEnumeratedControl widget except the -variable option. In addition, the -channel option can be provided to bind the matrix to an epics channel.

refsect1.title: METHODS
refsect1.para: The Get and Set methods work as for the radioMatrix.
